title: UK constitution unwritten, just laws and customs

content.prompt: Which of the following statements pertaining to the British constitution is true?

choices.label: It is based primarily on religious law.
It consists of laws, customs, and conventions.
It is comprised of a single written document.
It is the oldest written constitution in the world.

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors of a course country.
